about_the_game:
The 70s Car Bundle adds 70s-inspired car content to Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All! The DLC includes 14 new body kits, four new sets of rims, and a new parachute. An additional three paint bundles will let you fly your favorite nostalgic colors.

*Must own C1000, Elmo, LemmasGT, CelineGT, Noah69, MuseGT, Gallie vehicle(s) to apply new body kits.
detailed_description:
The 70s Car Bundle adds 70s-inspired car content to Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All! The DLC includes 14 new body kits, four new sets of rims, and a new parachute. An additional three paint bundles will let you fly your favorite nostalgic colors.

*Must own C1000, Elmo, LemmasGT, CelineGT, Noah69, MuseGT, Gallie vehicle(s) to apply new body kits.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 7400 @ 3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 2700 X @ 3.7GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
